WorkoutPlanDescription: This workout plan is tailored for weight loss with a focus on full-body exercises using gym equipment. It's designed for beginner fitness levels, with a 30-minute duration. The plan accommodates your sprained ankle by avoiding high-impact exercises. The plan includes a mix of free weights and body weight exercises to keep your workouts interesting and challenging.

WorkoutJson.name: Seated Row
instructions: Choose a seated row machine at the gym.
Sit down and adjust the machine to fit your body.
Grasp the bar with both hands and pull it towards your chest.
Release the bar and repeat for the desired number of reps.

WorkoutJson.name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Choose a lat pulldown machine at the gym.
Sit down and adjust the machine to fit your body.
Grasp the bar with a shoulder-width overhand grip.
Pull the bar down towards your chest, squeezing your lats at the top.
Release the bar and repeat for the desired number of reps.

WorkoutJson.name: Bicep Curl
instructions: Choose a dumbbell or barbell at the gym.
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Grasp the weight with your palms facing forward.
Curl the weight up towards your shoulders.
Release the weight and repeat for the desired number of reps.

WorkoutJson.name: Tricep Dip
instructions: Choose a tricep dip machine or a bench at the gym.
Sit down and adjust the machine to fit your body.
Lower your body down by bending your elbows until your arms are bent at a 90-degree angle.
Straighten your arms to return to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

WorkoutJson.name: Leg Press
instructions: Choose a leg press machine at the gym.
Sit down and adjust the machine to fit your body.
Push the platform away from you with your feet.
Release the platform and repeat for the desired number of reps.

WorkoutJson.name: Calf Raise
instructions: Choose a calf raise machine or a step at the gym.
Stand on the machine or step with your heels hanging off the edge.
Raise up onto your tiptoes.
Lower back down to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.
